objects.description: Monitor domain controller logs for replication requests and other unscheduled activity possibly associated with DCSync.(Citation: Microsoft DRSR Dec 2017) (Citation: Microsoft GetNCCChanges) (Citation: Samba DRSUAPI) Note: Domain controllers may not log replication requests originating from the default domain controller account.(Citation: Harmj0y DCSync Sept 2015) Analytic 1 - Monitor for replication requests from IPs not associated with known domain controllers. index=security sourcetype="WinEventLog:Security" EventCode=4662 AccessMask=0x100 guid IN ("1131f6ad-9c07-11d1-f79f-00c04fc2dcd2", "1131f6aa-9c07-11d1-f79f-00c04fc2dcd2", "9923a32a-3607-11d2-b9be-0000f87a36b2", "89e95b76-444d-4c62-991a-0facbeda640c")
